name: TonsOfDamage
tagline: TonsOfDamage is your League of Legends Android app for stay tuned and know everything about League of Legends
body:
# TonsOfDamage
TonsOfDamage is your League of Legends Android app for stay tuned and know everything about League of Legends

It uses [Teemo](https://github.com/imablanco/Teemo) library for comunicate with Riot API.
 
With TonsOfDamage, you cand have all the information about LoL at your fingertips.
Read everything about your favorite champions, items, summoners, etc.

Customize the app to see your games, stats, champion mastery and so much more.
You can even mark your favorite champions and summoners to have them always at your sight.

Try now TonsOfDamage and start enjoying.



# Disclaimer
TonsOfDamage isn't endorsed by Riot Games and doesn't reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. League of Legends and Riot Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. League of Legends Â© Riot Games, Inc.
